item.title: About
item.description: I’m a Offensive Security Certified Professional(OSCP) and Certified Junior Penetration Tester(eJPT). I spend most of my free time hunting bugs or making open source tools. Currently I’m working(contractor) as a Web Security Engineer at Red Queen Tech. Profiles bugcrowd/mzfr hackerone/mzfr intigriti/mzfr Resume You can find my resume - here
